text:
Hey Guys
I have created the custom module for header section. I am using the below mentioned code to upload logo dynamically through the template:
{% logo
                override_inherited_src="{{ module.logo_field.override_inherited_src }}"
                src="{{ module.logo_field.src }}"
                alt="{{ module.logo_field.alt }}"
                width='130'
                suppress_company_name="{{ module.logo_field.suppress_company_name }}"
              %}

But, I want to add the link to logo so that we can changes the logo link as per requirement through the template and reuse it.
Kindly help me how i can do this
